mapper.insert: INSERT INTO asset ( asset_num, asset_type, feature_hw, feature_sw, interface_type, asset_performer ) VALUES ( #{assetNum}, #{assetType}, #{featureHw}, #{featureSw}, #{interfaceType}, #{assetPerformer} )
mapper.select: SELECT asset_num as assetNum, asset_type as assetType, feature_hw as featureHw, feature_sw as featureSw, interface_type as interfaceType, asset_performer as assetPerformer FROM asset WHERE asset_num = #{assetNum}
